verses.name: Luke 18:17
verses.text: Verily I say unto you, Whosoever shall not receive the kingdom of God as a little child shall in no wise enter therein.

verses.name: Luke 18:18
verses.text: And a certain ruler asked him, saying, Good Master, what shall I do to inherit eternal life?

verses.name: Luke 18:19
verses.text: And Jesus said unto him, Why callest thou me good? none is good, save one, that is, God.

verses.name: Luke 18:20
verses.text: Thou knowest the commandments, Do not commit adultery, Do not kill, Do not steal, Do not bear false witness, Honour thy father and thy mother.

verses.name: Luke 18:21
verses.text: And he said, All these have I kept from my youth up.
